# REX Slew then Scan

## Quick start

Usage:  make run

Typical output:

    {
      "Scan_begin": {
        "VB": "[0.005183550983728896, 0.9999865403262471, -0.00022352973394401443]",
        "AP": "[0.9254165783983234, 0.16317591116653482, -0.3420201433256687]",

      },

        "VB": "[0.005183550983728896, 0.9999865403262471, -0.00022352973394401443]",
